version_description: While Willy and Milly try to make it to the top, we keep working to make Trivia Crack Adventure the best possible experience. This version includes new fixes and improvements. We hope you like them!
While Willy and Milly try to make it to the top, we keep working to make Trivia Crack Adventure the best possible experience. This version includes new fixes and improvements. We hope you like them!
Every big adventure begins with a goal to accomplish. We added some missions to guide your way. Which one do we start with?
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time
A real adventurer needs to check his gear to continue on his way: we implemented some technical improvements, made some visual arrangements, and fixed some bugs. Let's continue with the adventure!
We made a strategic stop on our adventure to fix some bugs and make some visual improvements. Now, we can continue on our way!
